name: Master Caster (UnrealAlien)
description:
Once upon a time there was a wizard called Caster
who had become invisible
because of evil enemies who made fun of him
so much that he vanished...
Caster suffered from invisibility for some time
until he decided to seek revenge
and take back his visibility!

This game is made by Maura Ruopsa, Pauli Hamunen, Mia Parpala and Sami Palomäki.
